name: TopconyCam
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Topcony Cam skill is compatible with specific AC powered Wi-Fi cameras. Not all cameras using the Topcony Cam app can utilize the Topcony Cam skill. Prior to using this skill, kindly consult the sellers to verify if your product supports Alexa.

To begin, please follow the steps outlined below:

1. Download the Topcony Cam app from the App Store or Google Play. Connect your camera to the Topcony Cam app and ensure it remains online and active.
2. Open the Alexa app and locate the Topcony Cam Skill. Tap on "Enable Skill" to link your camera with your Alexa account. Then, locate your camera within the app.
3. Experiment with voice commands such as "Alexa, display the living room" to view live video feeds and monitor the well-being of your home.
